pageContext.claim: “We are represented by Democrats that don't want to hear it because to them, they'll take anybody. They don't care about crime, they just want to get votes. They think these are all going to be votes for them someday, and other reasons.”
pageContext.analysis: Democrats support increased border security, just not Trump's wall. Only citizens can vote, so it's unclear what Trump is talking about when he says Democrats think immigrants "are all going to be votes for them someday." Immigrants can't vote if they are legal residents or are in the United States without authorization. It takes many years of legal residency before a foreign-born individual may apply for citizenship.
